mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Eugene Applebaum College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences is one of Wayne State University's founding colleges. The college moved to the Glen Paulsen-designed Shapero Hall building on the main campus in 1965. The College of Pharmacy moved out for lack of space in 1975. -- http://www.michiganmodern.org/buildings/wayne-state-university-shapero-hall-of-pharmacy [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
